forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 58F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 52F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 15C. ENE winds shifting to SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 60F. ENE winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 13C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 56F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 54F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
